//C/C++ Header

#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cassert>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>

//Data Structure Header File

#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<list>
#include<bitset>

using namespace std;

//Macros

#define FOR(i,a,b)    for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define pb            push_back
#define mp            make_pair
#define s(n)          scanf("%d",&n);
#define sl(n)         scanf("%lld",&n);
#define sf(n)         scanf("%lf",&n);
#define ss(n)         scanf("%s",n);
#define mm(a,s)       memset(a,s,sizeof(a));
#define INF           (int)1e9
#define EPS           ie-9
#define maX(a,b)      (a>b?a:b)
#define miN(a,b)      (a<b?a:b)

//Typedef

typedef vector<int> VI;
//typedef vector<vector<int>> VVI
typedef long long LL;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;


int main()
{
 int t;
 LL N;
 
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
     sl(N);
    if((N&(N-1))!=0)
     printf("BMEENA\n");
     else
     printf("BKUL\n");
     
 }
    
    system("pause");
    return 0;
}
